title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 101.2 - Superintendent's right of examination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 101.2 - Superintendent's right of examination

State Regulations

Such contract for independently furnished automated data
processing services shall state that the superintendent or his authorized
representative has the right to examine all records and material, use the
equipment and interview employees of the firm or banking organization
furnishing the services to the extent he deems necessary to protect the
interests of depositors, creditors or stockholders of the banking organization
or licensee receiving such services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
101.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
